data.Title: Microsoft Combats Non-Consensual Intimate Images on Bing
data.Description: Microsoft partners with StopNCII to remove non-consensual intimate images, including deepfakes, from Bing search results, using a hash database to identify and block such content.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Concludes
data.Description: The Google August 2024 core update has finished rolling out, taking 19 days to complete. Initial observations suggest a mixed bag of results, with some positive outcomes but a predominantly negative impact overall.

data.Title: Google Search Volatility Persists After August Core Update
data.Description: Despite the completion of the August core update, Google Search ranking volatility remains high, raising questions about whether it's the tail end of the update or a new development.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT Faces Early User Feedback and Analysis
data.Description: Early users of OpenAI's SearchGPT report challenges with shopping and local queries, along with instances of inaccurate or fabricated information, highlighting the need for further development.

data.Title: SEO Tools Enhance AI Overview Tracking and Analysis
data.Description: SEO tools are incorporating features to track and analyze AI Overviews, providing insights into opportunities, competitive challenges, and ranked page overlap. Semrush and SERanking are highlighted for their new capabilities.

data.Title: Google Emphasizes Contextual Links in Core Updates
data.Description: Following the August Core Update, the importance of contextual links for SEO is highlighted, emphasizing their role in signaling content relevance and authority to Google.

data.Title: Google Ads and Merchant Center Updates
data.Description: Google introduces several updates to Google Ads and Merchant Center, including a new "Merchant products" tab in the image library, automatic account linking, and changes to parked domain advertising.

data.Title: YouTube Algorithm and SEO Insights Revealed
data.Description: A series of videos and a compiled post provide insights into YouTube's algorithm and SEO, covering factors influencing video ranking, such as categories, tags, posting consistency, descriptions, and embedded videos.
